channel.title: Documentation on Blog test
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Blog test

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Welcome to the Roadster theme documentation. This quick start guide covers Roadster theme installation and minimal configuration and is intended for intermediate to advanced users. To understand this guide, you need to be familiar with the Hugo static site generator.

item.title: Customization
item.description: Customization page describes common Roadster configuration parameters which can be specified via configuration file or via Front Matter section. That includes logo section tuning, adding a sidebar with widgets, adjusting highlight color, and more.

item.title: Frequently asked questions (FAQ)
item.description: Browse this FAQ page to find answers to frequently asked questions that have not been covered elsewhere in the documentation.
